38905157.review:
おっぱいゲーなのですがアクション部分が気になったので、そこを中心にレビューします。

評価点
・キャラ毎の固有アクションがそれぞれに用意されている。
同じような武器は、固有アクションが似たような動きになりがちだがそうではない。

・派生コマンドの入力時間の猶予が広い


問題点
・キャラ毎の性能差が大きすぎる。特にパワー系は不遇。
刀や銃を持っているキャラクターは攻撃範囲が広く、雑魚処理やボスキャラの戦闘に難を感じる事はないが、パワー系のように一撃が重い攻撃を行うキャラは正直辛い。
辛いと感じた点は1.アクション後の硬直が長い 2.攻撃範囲が見た目通りで、雑魚処理が面倒　3.弱→弱→強攻撃の派生攻撃の間に小さなノックバックが発生し、攻撃が当たらなくなる(1部キャラ)

・やっかいな雑魚モブの存在
プレイヤーを中心に円状に走る足が速い雑魚モブが特に面倒。そして氷属性持ち。
他にも浮遊している雑魚モブも先述の攻撃範囲の短いキャラクターにとってはとても辛い。

・ボスキャラの仕様
スーパーアーマーを持っている。これだけではガードや回避を駆使して戦えばいいのだが序盤から1対3を強いられる。また視界の外からも攻撃はしてくるので、プレイアブルキャラと同じく硬直が長かったり、範囲が狭くてもストレスフルだ。


総括
これらの問題点に対処するには、チュートリアルが終わったあたりからファーミング・レベリングを行い、ストーリーに逆らいキャラ固定でストーリーを進めればよいのだが・・・

このアクション部分に耐えられれば、良おっぱいカスタムゲームが待っている。

38849163.review:
总体而言，对我这种死肥宅来说算是个不错的游戏。
优点首当其冲就是闪乱神乐系列招牌的某部位特供物理引擎。人物很多，虽然手感好的就那么几个。更衣室也是一个亮点，虽然玩法不多。当然，还有各种各样的杀必死等你去发掘解锁并且使用游戏里的钱购买233
槽点就真的说不完了。最大的问题还是建模，已经明显不是画风问题，而是制作有些粗糙了，[spoiler]除了贫乳，欧派都是一个样[/spoiler]。商店里的内衣抽奖概率不可信，40%的时候已经是5次出一次新了，然而加钱更亏，提升的概率太少了。剧情单调不多说，我们萌豚买这种游戏没指望这个。操作手感前面提过了，有的人物前期那就是让你糟心，关键是这游戏各种动作的后摇都长的让人可以思考一下人生了，然而剧情第一遍强制使用剧情角色，每个角色轮一遍的感觉，挺磨人耐心的。
我玩的时间也不长，现在还在慢慢磨剧情关，闲着无聊抽下内衣，顺便去更衣室耍耍，总而言之，不推荐原价买。如果放空脑袋，享受萌妹子各种爆衣摆pose，顺便打打怪，这还算是个不错的游戏。

38775788.review:
Senran Kagura ! aaaaaah Senran Kagura !

J'ai découvert cette license via ce jeu en me disant que j'allais seulement me rincer l'oeil sur de belles paires de seins détenues par de jolies shinobi et au final... Le jeu est ultra amusant et permet de passer de super moments.

Les points positifs :

- le jeu tourne dans une vraie qualité 1080p/60fps donc c'est beau, c'est fluide et pour un jeu dans le style manga c'est encore mieux.
- 28 personnages jouables dans un hack'n'slash c'est juste énorme il n'y a pas moyen de s'ennuyer (et en + vous en avez encore 7 en dlc qui valent le coup).
- Chaque filles possèdent leur propre style de combat bien propre à elles-même allant de la grosse épée aux Wakizashi en passant encore par des katanas (unique, double ou encore 6 donc 3 dans chaque mains), la double faux et enfin des éventails.
- de longues heures de jeux devant vous car il y a le mode histoire "millenium festival" qui se passe sur 8 jours de 5 à 7 missions par jours et les "shinobi girls heart" qui ajoutent une histoire à chaque fille (à débloquer dans des conditions à remplir dans le scénario) + encore des missions en duo et spéciales en dlc (souvent en promo d'ailleurs).
- Il y a un mode en ligne disponible avec plusieurs modes de jeux allant à la co-op de destruction de vagues d'ennemis, au PVP et à la capture de soutien-gorge.
- vous n'avez plus 1 mais bien des dizaines de petites-amies maintenant (ben ouais ! ça compte !)
- LES BOOBS !!! LES NICHONS BORDEL !!! LES SEINS !!! QUE DIRE DE + ?!
Les points négatifs :

- Même si le jeu est amusant et très long, il faut aimer le genre beat'em all/hack'n'slash car cela peut vite devenir répétitifs.
- L'histoire ne tient que sur une demi feuille, de bonnes idées étaient exploitables mais parfois ne sont plus évoquées.
- Il faut être particulièrement ouvert d'esprit pour y jouer (cela n'est pas trop un point négatif mais pour certaines personnes mieux vaut être prévenu).

En conclusion : Senran Kagura estival versus est un très bon "dynasty warriors like" qui fait, je dirai même, encore mieux que ceux-çi ce qui est surprenant pour une copie et permet de ne pas s'ennuyer une fois dedans car les filles sont jolies, attachantes, bien formées (c'est le but) et le fan-service du jeu est totalement assumé ce qui fait qu'on ne peut pas le lui reprocher à tous les niveaux. Et puis messieurs, LES NICHONS !!! LES NICHOOOOOOOOOONS !!!!!!!!!

38754556.review:
Estival Versus takes everything from its predecessor and improves it in almost every way.

The game retains the fast gameplay of brutally smashing your way through loads of mooks and taking on other playable characters as boss characters. Admittedly you're limited in your normal form to light and heavy attacks, but accessing your shinobi or frantic forms opens things up more with special attacks available through energy gained during battle. It's straightforward fun that revels in chaos. Ultimate skills have been made easier to access while still having large energy costs to activate, which can be fun.

Variety has been expanded on with additional characters both available from the base game and as DLC, bringing with them their own combo styles and special attacks. Existing characters have also been tweaked, such as the lead shinobi gaining new transformation ultimate skills, while characters like Hibari don't feel as clumsy as in SV. New mooks have been added to the mix like the extremely dangerous ram shinobi and new items to play around with like status bombs or summoning a puppet walker.

Stages now encourage exploration more with optional festival platforms to find and demolish for bonuses, on top of merely going to find extra items to make boss encounters slightly easier. Sometimes this can mean finding a way around the energy barriers in place. New techniques like wall running and attacking from them help to make the environments more part of the action.

The story has also improved. SV's story was pretty good taken on its own but kinda dragged on too long to the point I mashed buttons trying to speed read it to get back to the action. EV feels a lot more sensible about it and does an excellent job of providing both light-hearted fanservice laden humour with more serious emotional stories.

Also, yes, visuals are also boosted. Especially the fanservice, with all new environment based finishers if you happen to defeat a boss next to certain objects in the stage. Or you could spend time in the dressing room posing characters, which is only as pervy as you'd want it to be.

The one drawback is that the game can get a bit grindy in the storyline missions. In SV frantic mode could demolish enemies very quickly, even for bosses. In EV frantic mode feels necessary to get through some of the later missions at anything resembling a decent pace. Some mook combinations can also be rather brutal, especially with the aforementioned ram shinobi that cab inflict stun. Not to mention the very final boss that is several levels of cheap. And that's on the easiest difficulty setting.

But it's still a game I keep going back to because there's more to do or I just feel like smashing my way through a variety of enemies.

38534026.review:
这是我近几年玩过打击感最强的NZ...噢不对，弹性最足的动作游戏

==========================================================================
42小时全成就后再回来编辑下这个测评。

圣诞大促时入手的，配置不高且自带中文。这个游戏用两个字概括的话就是带感！打击感不用说，小姐姐们用各种镰刀太刀收割一片片杂兵时的感觉那叫一个爽。人物上来看26个角色性格鲜明，大和抚子、中二病、元气死宅个个都有（雪泉小姐姐超棒！），每个小姐姐站姿步态不带重样，和角色的性格也十分符合，游戏里还经常出现些动画梗，我就不说大道场学姐的造型了，简直就是吊爷+JO太郎的合体。游戏中的福利的更是玩出了花，我在刷50个摇摇终结画面的时候忍不住感叹，能设计出这么多羞耻又色气的场面的家伙真特娘的是个人才。游戏性来说大部分战斗都是刷杂兵跑点循环→打boss的模式。本人手残所以大部分战斗选的都是普通难度，基本没有卡关问题。前期等级低的关系限制比较多，经常需要考虑如何在对手没变身前用技能秒掉她，有时候还得想办法优先解决远程的boss，后期等级压制了基本一路无双到底。当然肝帝也可以先把角色等级刷高再通剧情。另外成就也不算特别难刷（只要有一颗顽强的肝），真心感谢staff没把抽奖放进成就系统里，不然这个全成就还得推迟好久，120个签抽到后面真的是个神坑。

稍微说几个小问题好了，首先是剧情。虽然我和大多数人入这个游戏的初衷都是为了看小姐姐福利，但说实话个人刷完主线以后就开始有些审美疲劳了，其实有点希望爆衣还有战败特写能和变身动画一样可以选择跳过。此外大部分角色在个人章节里的互动很有趣，但还有些剧情真的有点....感觉有点像那种看了四五分钟就想右上角的动画，可能是我欣赏不来吧...还有就是个别重武器角色玩起来真的超累，经常得追着一个个远程杂兵打，但跑到跟前她们却又会蜜汁向后滑出攻击距离，而且有些角色的大招看起来很华丽，但判定范围或者机制却又很迷，比如未来的LB+X，虽然是跟踪弹，弹物流发里只有两三发能打到人。

总的来说虽然有一点点小问题，但瑕不掩瑜，假如爱好无双割草类游戏，或者喜欢看少女们日常卖卖萌再捎带点福利的话强烈推荐这个游戏。

全成就了，来写个评测
首先说一句，【请用手柄玩这个游戏】
键盘操作反人类的。


这是我17年玩过最棒的动作游戏
最大的优点是招式与奥义的动作分镜比前作的shinobi versus要好上很多，充满了力度与张力
其次比起前作的人物单挑，任务风格大多更偏向了割草无双（但是从绝难度开始精英小兵就开始会格挡和防反了x
人物间对决人物的战术比起前作的玩命猪突站撸有了很大变化，主要就是去找吹飞的机会并借此空中追击打一套连段（这一作的空中追击设定超级过瘾
人物的移动动作也比前作要流畅了许多，有不少有意思的小细节（
（空中突进完全是月步的感觉，不像sv就只是稍微的位移一段距离
游戏难度并不高，比起前作要低了不少，普通难度的话基本不会有被吊打的毫无还手之力的时候（对上某不良学姐的时候除外），熟悉游戏操作后普通难度很轻松就能通关主线
换装要素比较多，但是说实话，由于大部分的衣服风格都不太喜欢，所以对于我来说种类还是挺少的
因为又想让人物看起来漂亮符合人设，又不想让妹子们穿上雷同的衣服，实在是很困难
为此还入了两个服装的dlc（
主线任务第一次过关是限定使用人物的，过关一次之后就能任意使用角色来通关关卡（于是就可以在1-2疯狂给人物练级x
随着任务中对祭典神橹的击破，会解锁后续的剧情与人物们的日常支线任务，也是很有意思
音乐普普通通，并没有太多可圈可点之处，也不会有很大的违和感，不过在人物忍转身时就会播放各阵营的bgm确实很棒
不过要说的话最令我印象深刻就是最后两姬boss战的bgm了
音乐响起，伴随着【最终战】的字样，确实把我的心给震撼了一下
最后祭典结束，两姬与两个妹妹诀别的时候
还是稍微有被感动到的


最后说说奶子
（果然是以奶子闻名的系列啊，福利多的不是盖的
忍转身过程中的卖肉比起前作的特写更加流畅与自然
击败爆衣，嗯
场景爆衣杀，嗯
更衣室的触摸之手和kiss功能
超大
大到不自然
大到穿模（
但是很好看（
超棒（
开头附送一段很棒的2d混3d的泳装片头（日影的双辫子头真的可爱


悄悄的说一说这游戏不让人开心的部分吧：
1.有一些角色低段时很难用，攻击力又低手又短，尤其以各种蓄力角色为代表（对就是你葛城
2.虽然打击感很不错，人物动作很有张力，但是有些角色的张力大过头了，招式后摇超级长（对就是你斑鸠和夜樱
3.各阵营的队长与日影两姬这种秘忍法是进入另外一种战斗形态的角色，秘忍法发动时那一下超级高伤，但是形态转换之后的攻击方式很不好用，华而不实

5.爆难度的大道寺学姐

38059961.review:
I'm bad at reviews in general but I'm decent in giving advice before diving into a game.

-Play it on easy: Increasing the difficulty will only increase the level of the enemies that you are fighting and doesn't have much of an effect on the bosses you fight either, essentially it just turns the enemies into annoying sponges.

-Prepare for yourself for a story that feels like Naruto filler: Some of the character backstories are interesting enough to watch through, the rest are extremely cringey for some people to bare. (I like a dose of cringe from to time to time.)

-Some mechanics aren't mentioned any where in the game and require you to go else where: An example being animation cancelling with the block button, which massivly decreses the animation time at the end of a combo or dash. This is a must in order to safely make your way though the game.

-Don't worry about the collectables until you need to grab them for Day 8: You can go searching for them with your favourite character after you finish day 7, that way you can get a powerful character as well as know how many statues need to be collected on each level, killing two birds with one stone essentially.

-Grades for levels mean nothing: Don't worry about the grade at all, it's just based on the damage you take and can always be boosted to an A when you replay the levels with your favourite OP character.

-Finally, as always enjoy the game for what it is: It's a game with its main selling point being the large variety of PERSONALITIES and isn't a game with any idea of a metagame in mind. Speaking as an experienced MOBA player and Game Design graduate, this game is completley unbalanced as projectiles are impossible to land even with well timed attacks, invinciblity frames vary way to much on secret art attacks to be considered fair, you don't have any effective catch barring a few abilities on certain characters and finally the DLC and secret characters have unfair mechanics involved in there abilities in general. That being said, the game is incredibly satisfying when you are able to land these attacks or even dodging them when you are able to master simple things like parrying. This is mainly due to the skill ceiling being so low, that bad players have a chance of winning even against experienced players. A game that screams about being all about fun from my perspective.

For those who wanna play under 2 hours to get it refunded, I would still play those 1 hour and 59 mins of this game, cause you will get an incredible amount of enjoyment out of the experience.

37982275.review:
This game is a huge improvement over shinovi versus and deep crimson in terms of overall production quality and gameplay. Each character now feels a lot different from each other (for the most part) and handles uniquely, which is a giant step up from SV where you could basically play every character the same way without consequence. 
There's a lot more art here, cutscenes, girls, stages, music, and basically everything. My only problem with this game lies in that it feels like a step back in terms of customization from deep crimson and even SV. There seems to be less outfits and hairstyles which kinda bums me out, BUT the addition of having a completely different outfit between your pre-transformed look and post-transformed is great. 
If you like these games, this one is the quintessential entry in my opinion, where it feels like the devs are really starting to hit a stride with the series and where it finally seems like they finally have the budget and manpower to actually differentiate these games from the other dynasty wwarriors type games out there. 
Also I'd have to heavily reccomend the Ikki Tosen and Ayane (Dead or Alive) DLC packs since the characters those add are a ton of fun to play as.

37887893.review:
IF you like gratuitous fanservice ...
IF you like surprisingly emotional stoy-telling ...
IF you like well-crafted controls in a hack-n-slash setting ....

BUY this game. Compared to the previous entries in the series, the action is more dynamic. Movement initially feels slower, but this makes the combat more than button-mashing. Movement is smooth, the graphics stay good and constant throughout the action, and the stages are much larger and varied than before. All of the characters feel varied in their attacks and movement, so its easy to find a character that suits your playstyle, from a pure gameplay perspective.

The story is very anime, for better or for worse. However, the actresses deliver their lines well, especially when more serious story elements are contrasted against some of the more offbeat dialogue. The game is well-translated; taking these two disparate elemnts into account and making enough references to make these scenes resonate with non-Japanese audiences. This makes it easy to find a favorite character through their personality, and these personalities  will probably have you want to keep playing a character even if you don't like how they play. With the sheer number of characters, you'd be hard-pressed to find a character that you don't develop a preference for.

This game promises tons of hack-n-slash fighting and even more fanservice. No doubt about it, it delivers on these fronts.  If you like sheer, unapologetic ANIME stories and games, then this is a good buy for the price.

37155312.review:
[h1] Lots of busty anime ninja girls fight and rip each other's clothes [/h1]

If you're not scared away by the words above, you probably should consider getting this game.  While this game can look like waifu-bait trash (like most indie VN in steam), the amount of fun you can have while playing is simply amazing. Well, let me explain it in details.

[h1] Gameplay and story[/h1]

Yeah, in that order.

Simply put, this game belongs to the musou type. It's a type of slasher, where you play as some kind of badass hero facing dozens and dozens of brain-dead enemies. They usually die from several hits (sometimes one even), but the amount of them is making up for that. 1000+ defeated enemies by the end of the level and 1000-5000 hit combo counter are a pretty common thing here. A well-known example of musou game is Dynasty Warriors.

So the gameplay is pretty much like this: you take one of 25+ girls (you're getting to play all of them in story mode (except dlc ones ofc), and can also replay any mission with the one you choose), read some dialogues VN-style, enter a level, which is usually a set of arenas in beach/school grounds setting and etc, fight a huge amount of enemies and another one of the girls as a boss, read some more dialogues, get expirence for the girl you played as. Very important features of that process are:

1. Clothes rip from damage. One of the main features of the series. If done right, absolutely all clothes can be destroyed. ABSOLUTELY. ALL. [strike]Damn those bright lights in points of interest[/strike]

2. Sexy finishers. Finest additoin of the game to the series. Think stage fatalites from Mortal Combat, but instead of killing, it rips all of the clothes in some fun way (like butts getting stuck in basketball hoop). Lots, lots of them.

3.  25 playable girls (plus old lady and dlc chars), each with it's own quirks, music theme, playstyle and awesome special abilities (seeing all of the ultimates was one of the main goals for me)

4. Shinobi Henshin. Henshin like in 'magical girl anime', but with shinobi. Changes clothes of the character (undressing as stage one), while her music theme starts playing, with striking a pose in the end. Epic stuff. Also, free health.

In terms of time, game can take a lot. Here is the list of things you can do in the game:

[list]
    [*]Complete story mode
    [*]Find all platforms in story mode to unlock side stories
    [*]Complete side stories for every character
    [*]Unlock every sexy finisher
    [*]Play even more side quests, especially with dlc
    [*]Play online
    [*]Mess with different hairstyles and clothes in dressing room
    [*]Find the ability to touch girls in dressing room
    [*][strike]Loose faith in humanity[/strike]
[/list]

All of that can easily take 30+ hours on lowest difficulty.

Probably it all sounds simple and stupid, but smooth and polished controls (can't express enough how enjoyable it is to mow down enemies with huge combos and special abilities), good music, not bad humour with some typical ecchi anime tropes and A LOT of fanservice for the eyes make it a very enjoyable and fun experience.

In terms of story though... It's a bit mixed. In Shinobi Versus we had 4 different stories for each school (group of 5 girls), which were not too original, but kept me interested most of the time. Story in Estival Versus can be described in two words:

[b] BEACH EPISODE [/b]

Well, there's also some talk about training for a fight with some badass monster, but it's suddenly forgotten in the end [spoiler] when it suddenly becomes only about Ryobi and Ryona dealing with the loss of their older sister [/spoiler]. Most of the time it's just stuff like playing games on the beach, with penalties like eating your own pantsu (not joking).

Side stories make up for that though. There's one for every girl, 5 missions each. I found them more fun, than main story, as they are focused on a certain subject, which is problematic for a character (or for everyone around her) and interactions with other girls on that subject, with result usually ending up being hilarious.

[h1] Graphics [/h1]

Unlike Shinobi Versus, this one is a port from PS4, so it's already good in terms of resolution. Character models are done in "3D that is like anime 2D" style, with all the right parts bouncing and faces being very expressive. Other stuff on the levels is kinda meh, but it's not the center of attention here. Besides, game is optimized perfectly. I've never experienced a single drop of FPS, no matter how many enemies and effects were on the screen at a time, and my rig is not top tier at all. Overall - style above graphics.

[h1] Sound and music [/h1]

Simply awesome.

Some of my personally favourite seyuu are doing voices here, like Hikasa Yoko and Kobayashi Yuu. Most of the dialogues are fun simple because of the way they are delivered, and some of the sounds girls make are simply adorable or... well... interesting.

Sound effects - pretty much ok. Don't really remember, don't hate at all. Also some typical anime sounds.

Music - can't stop listening some of the themes out of the game. Each girl has her own theme, which represents her personality. Classy Gessen academy girls even have arrangments of classical pieces as their music. For example, serious-number-one-waifu-Yumi's theme is arrangment of Lacrimosa from Mozart's Requiem (and it was Dies Irae in SV). Original themes are awesome as well, my personal favourites being Hikage's and Yagyuu's themes.

[h1] Final verdict [/h1]

A very fun musou/slasher game, with a lot of fanservice for ecchi anime fans. If you're not into anime at all - then most likely you won't be interested in this, as well as if you're not into ecchi.
 
Musou type can also be a problem for some - either it's enjoyable as hell, or boring as hell in an hour. 

You can also not like the amount of dlc it has, but you can easily separate them in 3 categories (clothes, story and characters) and buy only from the intersting one.

[h1] Personal score: 8/10 [/h1]

36981461.review:
This is a really fun game, one of my favorite releases in the last several years (oh boy does it have its faults though). But its more than that. This game embodies a struggling art in the media of the modern world; flamboyantly sexy strong fighting girls. There is a character for everyone in this game. Maybe even two or three.

First off, I won't be explaining what Senran Kagura is; if you're here, you probably already know that much. You don't have to play Shinovi (and other prior senran games) first to play Estival Versus. Yes, this game is a sequel to Shinovi and others, but its largely isolated in its own right.


[u][b]What does gameplay boil down to?[/b][/u]
[b]1) The fighting aspects:[/b] this is a game where you mash one or two buttons most of the time to win. However, there is more to it than that; namely the depth of the combat is dependent on the difficulty. This game has 5 main combat buttons. Weak attack, heavy attack, jump, dash, and guard. There are others, but they only matter in advanced play. In the simplest aspects, all you need to do is mash the weak attack button over and over and over to win, maybe chaining a dash or a heavy attack in there somewhere. However, on higher difficulties and multiplayer this becomes very ineffective.

[b]2) The dressing room:[/b] dress up the girls however you want, interact with them, then pose them to take pictures. People like dress up, and this game does it well and allows for a lot of customization.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=930654937

[b]3) The dialogue segments:[/b] Inbetween fights and while not in the dressing room you're probably reading visual novel dialogue sequences. These are often funny, but some also note they are innocuous or even just annoying to slug through.


[u][b]What does this game do really well?[/b][/u]
[b]1) A large varied cast.[/b] There are a lot of girls in this game, someone for everybody. Everybody is unique, which is hard to pull off with a cast of 24+ characters and limited dialogue. On the gameplay side of things, the core makes a lot of characters play very similarly but they all have their unique look and style, especially when you get indepth in the mechanics.

[b]2) The sexiness and flashiness.[/b] This game is brilliant in that respect. I think the franchise speaks for itself, but to summarize: Flamboyantly sexy strong fighting girls, as well as a flashy presentation that emphasizes the best (and sometime worst) of these features.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=885646584

[b]3) The performance as a port is really quite good, especially at 1080p.[/b] This is a solid A+ port in every aspect. In 200+ hours I've never experienced any hard crashes and frame drops (nothing memorable) in the single player experience. Multiplayer does have a few bugs though; see the steam forums for more (ex. respawn bugs, lobby bugs).


[u][b]What are things the game doesn't do so well (aka things you wish reviews told you)?[/b][/u]
[b]1) This game has a sucky entry slug.[/b] Characters start out at level 1, where they only have maybe 5 attacks of their entire arsenal unlocked. You have to slug through several missions with characters that basically can't do anything before it gets fun to play them. Specifically until you grind a character to 12th level, when most abilities are unlocked. This tends to go away after you figure the game mechanics out enough and that brings me to the next point.
[b]2) As typical of fighting games, this game has a lot of hidden mechanics.[/b] For example, all the different animation cancels, or the relationship between "heavies," "tech," and other characters, or the priority level of ninja arts. You can play the game the way the game tells you to, which is unoptimized, or you can read some guides to figure out how it really works. The later is essential if you want to touch multiplayer (or you can figure it out yourself). This is not a con, but a disclaimer.
[b]3) Unsurprisingly for a game like this the plot sucks.[/b] [spoiler]Only relevant plot is days 0 and 8.[/spoiler] I mean, this game is more for the individual fights and the sexiness embodied in those fights though.
[b]4) The fighting gameplay can be very repetitive.[/b] That is, once you understand how the game plays the offline combat has next to nothing to offer you.
[b]5) The DLC is frankly overpriced.[/b] Fortunately the base game has more than enough content to satisfy most. Some is highly recommended though, see my DLC reviews for details.


Multiplayer is a mixed bag. Find a community to play with, or you can put up with the cheese. Its the typical cheese / honor debate in a fighting game with poor balancing. I invested over 200 hours into the multiplayer, but what obviously your experience probably won't have the same mileage.
https://youtu.be/0MMIlBe2P6U?t=2m12s

36354411.review:
모든 캐릭터 속성 마스터(Lv.50) / 모든 스테이지 보,폭,절 난이도 (탈)수 / 모든 도전 과제 완료 했습니다.

 리뷰를 하자면, 패드로 조작하던 게임을 그대로 옮겨 와서 인지  마우스 조작감은 썩 좋지 못합니다. ( 중 요 )
그러나 '섬란카구라' 작품의 스토리나 게임성이 마음에 드는 유저 들은 재미있게 즐길 수 있는 게임이며, 저 또한 그러했습니다.
단지 스토리만 보는게 아닌 100% 동기화를 목적으로 하시는 분이라면 노가다성이 약하진 않다는 것만 알아주셨으면 합니다

 모든 미션에 캐릭터의 각자 스토리나 캐릭터들 간 대화 내용이 들어가 있어 스토리를 보는 재미도 추천하는 이유중의 하나입니다.
저는 '섬란카구라EV'가 처음 시작하는 작품 이었으나 상당히 만족 하였고, 저처럼 처음 이신 분들에게 적극적으로 까지는 아니더라도 일반적으로 추천 할 수 있는 수준의 게임입니다.

 다소 게임에 미숙하신 분들은 '루리웹-섬란카구라 게시판'에 가셔서 도움을 받으십시오. (100% 공략이 있습니다.)
물론 공략을 안보고 플레이 하는 것도 가능합니다. (재미를 위해 혼자서 해쳐 나가십시오.)

 그래픽이 비슷한 게임을 해보았다면 '나루티밋스톰4' 가 있습니다만, 비교하자면 차이점이 크진 않았습니다.
버그 또한 없다고 봐도 무방하며,  일부 버그들은 게임에 크게 지장을 주는 것들은 아니니 걱정 마십시오.
저는 상당히 만족 하였습니다. 여러분들도 그러시길 바랍니다.

 캐릭터 각자의 개성 또한 독특하고, 눈에 띄어 이름을 외우려 하지 않아도 어느정도 플레이를 하다보면 자동으로 외워집니다.

 비슷한 게임이 있다면 '원피스 해적무쌍3' 정도가 있겠네요.

 그리고 게임 플레이 전에 'YouTuBe' 에서 '섬란카구라OVA' 를 보시고 플레이를 하면 스토리에 살짝 도움이 됩니다.
(30분의 섬란카구라 애니메이션)

 이상! 제가 이 게임에서 느꼈던 걸 리뷰 해보았습니다.
도움이 되시길 바랍니다.

36267441.review:
讲道理，剧情差点感动到我了。
除去其靠卖肉作为引人注目的一个点之外，老实说，相比我库里面的真三我更喜欢这个。
在真三里面我并没有体验到将人击飞之后冲刺过去继续连击的感觉......不过真三有更多的其他的因素就是了。
随着剧情的推进，每个角色一共都会被选中2~3次，强制用户体验了一下每个角色，不过有些角色我玩起来真是没手感，比如未来。
总而言之，我认为是一款比较放松的割草游戏。
此外，一个缺点就是，普难度下敌人炮兵的AI感觉写的太差，默认在地上平移来远离玩家，当玩家回头之后，发现炮兵又会在玩家身后聚齐起来。
嘛，这个可以通过锁定+翔飞乱舞解决，也不是很大的问题，只是有点剩下10几只的时候清场有点麻烦而已。
然后触发神橹终结技的判断有点迷......我试了很多次才触发，可能是我操作的不当的缘故吧。

个人目前还没有打联机模式，感觉会被爆锤。
一开始本身就是抱着买一款休闲游戏的心态买的，倒也没有令我失望。

36170301.review:
Clunky, discursive and gimmicky combat.
Tons of outfits, sure, but they're non-customizable beyond a basic set of color schemes. Can't swap tops and bottoms.
The only real fair bit of options are locked behind DLCs, the accessories aside... And even these don't really match and merge well with existing outfits besides those they were MADE to go with.

All in all, the game provides the illusion of choice in style, both by character appearance and combat preferences, as the characters themselves also feature extremely polarized fighting styles, hidden passives and other effects, and essentially require a player to fight their way or give up to those that do so in their stead.

Even played well, the combat is just a series of repetitive combos broken only by the occasional 'parry' and excessive jumps and dashes if facing other players.

In essence, the style of attack and defense of each character is locked, thus forming tiers of viable and nigh-useless characters by their abilities, combos and DPS. Coupled with objectives such as tower defense, destruction, capture points and deathmatches... With limitations on which can be played, some characters become over-used in the areas they excel in whilst a few never get a chance to shine in ANY game mode.



All in all, I'd summarize by saying:
Senran Kagura Estival Versus is a game which locks many aesthetic options behind a fat paywall, choices in appearance horribly limited and clashing, with clunky combat and character gimmicks that ruin the experience.

36092548.review: a friend of mine introduced me to this game and im really impressed by it. in particular the ninja scroll animations and camera work (not what you think). Due to the cartoony style of this game there's none of that motion capture crap leading to it all being hand animated and these animations blow many of the AAA games animations out of the water. They're really expressive with real good fluid gestures (the version of the term used in art) and the fact that they've managed to create an anime game in 3D without it looking like crap is really impressive. but besides all that technical stuff the game is just really fun to play overall, especially with friends online as you can create your own scenarios and such. Me and my friend decided to fight an army of grandmas and then decided to have them fight each other. Really funny stuff. The cons however is that the UI is pretty bad and there's hardly any instructions on how to maneuver it. We had to test our way through to figure it out but that's a minor thing. Don't let the price tag fool you, its a really fun game and totally worth the 39,99.

36085165.review:
So Zeit für ein Review du magst Animes, Spiele mit Spaß und Action dann bist du hier genau richtig.

Senran Kagura Estival ist das zweite Spiel überhaupt für den PC und die Fortzsetzung von Senran Kagura Shinovi Versus.
Im Vergleich zum Vorgänger bietet das Spiel mehr Missionen und und Charakter.
Auch die Optik wurde verbessert das Spiel läuft wunderbar flüssig in 60 FPS. 
Der Soundtrack ist super gelungen und trägt zur Atmosphäre des Spiels bei.
Leider gibt es immer noch keine Deutsche Sprachausgabe aber wer dem Englischen mächtig ist hat kein Problem da sich das Game leicht erklärt.
Es gibt mehrere Spielmodis z.B den Storymodus oder die einzelnen Geschichten zu den Charaktern und 2 gegen 2 die neu dazu gekommen sind zudem kann man auch Online gegen andere Spieler in verchiedenen Wettbewerben antreten.

Das Spiel ist eine Kombination aus Beat em Up und Hack und Slash mit Rollenspielelementen im Animegewand.
Das Spiel bietet eine Menge Fanservice und Anspassungsmöglichkeiten der Charakter durch hunderte verschiedene Outfits und Accessories die man durch DLCs  noch erweitern kann.
Das Kampfsystem kann man gut vergleichen mit Dynasty Warriors oder One Piece Pirate Warriors Serie.
Am Besten lässst sich das Spiel mit einem Gamepad steuern.

Über den Inhalt muss  man nicht mehr viel sagen der Ruf eilt dem Spiel voraus :D [Ecchi Spaß bis die Brüste wackeln und die Klammoten vom Leib fliegen :D]

35996365.review: Avendo voglia di action, mi sono deciso di comprare Senran Kagura Estival Versus e ne sono rimasto piacevolmente soddisfatto. Togliendo il discorso delle ragazze che quando la loro vita cala, i loro vestiti vanno in pezzi e con varie eliminazioni ambientali divertenti da fare e da vedere, Senran offre comunque un gameplay divertente e a tratti anche impegnativo. Per quanto riguarda la storia, si alterna con momenti di pura ilarità, a momenti toccanti e momenti ignoranti e specialmente in questo ultimo caso, alla fine si risolve tutto con botte e grasse risate. Uno dei problemi più seri di Senran e quello dell'IA nemica, che quando gestisce i minion si incastrano in varie zone, per poi passare alle boss fight dove l'IA tende a essere eccessivamente spammona tra tecniche speciali e attacchi a distanza. Concludendo Senran Kagura Estival Versus si becca un bel 8 su 10 per avermi fatto passare tante ore in allegria, grazie ai momenti piu assurdi che accadono in game.

35937535.review:
嗯，这确实是款好游戏，这是不可否认的【滑稽脸】

整体来说，这是一款包含了割草、养成、换装、福利以及剧情元素的第三人称动作游戏。
2D渲染的日式动漫画面，割草＆boss战的打击感尚且优秀，剧情对情感方面的渲染比起前作更加优秀，声优对角色的演绎感情到位【一点也不尬】，加上无时不刻都要溢出屏幕的福利，让这成了名副其实的肥宅游戏。【这真的是款好游戏，不开玩笑！】
也许在人物建模上可以再画上更多的功夫吧。虽然比起SV画面确实大幅提升了，但是角色足部结构还是略棱角分明【雾】，希望后作可以更进一步(ー`´ー)

关于DLC呢，一骑当千、真神乐、菖蒲和两个剧情补充包可以收一波，游戏体验都不错。

35774635.review:
SENRAN KAGURA ESTIVAL VERSUS
Resumen:
-Una vez al año un festival se lleva acabo y todas las ninja de cada una de las diferentes artes es llamada para celebrar este evento en una isla remota donde lucharan entre ellas para demostrar cual es el mejor clan ademas de dar la oportunidad de poder ver una vez mas a quienes partieron de este mundo antes.
Jugabilidad:
-Un Hack&Slash muy divertido, los controles son fluidos, aun que a veces parece que la camara es muy tosca con los angulos o se niega a ponerse en la posicion que mas quisieramos
-El juego ademas de la historia principal nos da la posibilidad de conseguir coleccionables para el armario de nuestros personajes y completar misiones alternas a la historia, no seria raro ver que el juego logra tener una vida mucho mas larga gracias a estos dos aspectos.
Veredicto:
-Las animaciones dentro del juego son de primera calidad a veces llegarias a pensar que veras un capitulo del anime.
-El departamento grafico, a pesar de ser minimalista en las decoraciones nunca se ve desentonado, la estetica este muy bien cuidada.
-La banda sonora, la tipica de cualquier anime, muy animada y con buen tono, no diria que es algo de calidad excepcional ni que es musica fastidiosa.
-Si algo no le falta a este juego son WAIFUS.

7.5/10

気になる点はありますがキャラクターの笑顔とおっぱいで大体吹っ飛ぶのでこんなレビュー見ずに落とすが吉。

35298014.review:
这个宇宙中除了有质子、中子、电子、嗯。。。。。。还有奶子！！

==================================

一开始是看了动漫，才入了这个！！上一代应该和动漫剧情一样吧，没玩过猜测的。没想到原蛇女焰她们变成一个小队。

===================================

画质很好很惊艳，各种全开一直是60帧，战斗不卡顿这点必须好评！！

妹纸们好萌！！尤其是云雀跑的过程忽然停下，她还会摔倒萌我一脸WWW，摘下面具的丛也很萌什么啦等等，反正妹纸们各种萌=W=

感觉飞鸟最好用，我的错觉么，用手柄玩的话，一直A和XXXXX*N次方键，飞鸟几乎无敌（因为是主角么）。。。有些拿重型武器的妹纸连击不太好，对操作要求挺高的QAQQQ
PS：还有，大部分妹纸忍转身后都容易达成连击，一直按XXXX

爆衣、奶子奶子奶子什么的最好啦，还能解锁各种姿♀势，奶子天下第一！！

（PS：之前都是盗版玩的，太惭愧。玩了很久了，这次算是补票！）

===============================

DLC值得买真神乐和一骑当千三个妹纸、还有葛城姐姬友菖蒲。目前沉迷孙策不能自拔（主要是孙策太萌了，发大招最后还被自己打了一下萌死我了，孙策和云雀是神乐里两位萌货），真神乐简直无敌。（囊中羞涩就买了这三个DLC捂脸，充足了一定要把剩下的妹纸买买买来！！）

妹纸基本都开发了（大雾）除了没买的DLC妹纸，但是没仔细的品味，有时间慢慢享受，光几个妹纸已经让偶欲罢不能。现在刚又迷上了一个妹纸，美野里WW双马尾巨乳小萝莉。。走路一跳一蹦的太萌了。发大招那一刻慌乱表情萌我一脸鼻血23333（目前俺是慢慢的一个个仔细观察妹纸动作一笑一颦，寻求小细节）

===============================

个人觉得小百合老奶奶单挑挺厉害的，唯一不足是走路太慢，只能靠瞬移
不良大道寺学姐感觉出手最狠，一招大招就能几乎秒杀。
连击能轻易达到500以上的，不算大招的话，目前有飞鸟、吕布，暂时就这两位别的妹纸没仔细玩，回头玩WW

===============================

欣赏妹纸建议开最简单的，打一盘二十多分钟，其实俺不是太菜，是沉迷观察妹纸不能自拔QWQQ
唯一缺点就是，战斗光盯着妹纸，没法专心打架啦！

无论是X还是Y，也就是轻攻击或重攻击，结束时往往都要摆完poss才能再动，
当然，如果按B键瞬闪可以强制结束，但B键好用吗？
我觉得不好用，起码从我键盘的角度来看，不行。
游戏打敌人，包括少女们和杂兵，也都存在同样的问题，
没错，就是硬直问题。
当然，是从我打她的角度出发的，也就是我打她根本没反应。
简单的说，就是伤害到了，但她同时也在伤害我！懂了吗？
我相信这已经不是键盘或手柄的问题，两个没有硬直的家伙在对A，
往往决定胜负的是谁先打完自己的输出，因为输出到最后一定会有击飞效果。
那么换句话说，攻击速度快的少女就占有了绝对性的优势。
游戏只有在飞行效果时，才会必定出现打击感，
我认为不行，收招硬直影响了游戏爽快感，
双方无硬直同样使得攻击没有爽快感，
就好比辐射里，俩个拿近战武器的家伙在对砍，从操作和视觉上，根本没有一点意思。
甚至有的时候，对方无硬直，而我却有硬直，我先出手却被后手打断，
更有甚者，对方倒地，我冲过去干，结果我衣服爆了，难以理解。
而如果要我说这游戏哪里最傻（哔），那我会毫不犹豫说是扔炸弹。
太他（哔）的傻了，真的，无论是杂兵还是少女，
从AI设置上，你走到哪，她就犹如护舒宝一样贴身的跟到哪，绝无侧漏
然而扔炸弹是有弧线的，目测就甩个拖鞋远的距离，但就是砸不到。
护舒宝，懂？没用过，就是买一块试试。
而Y键是重攻击，尼玛捡了个炸弹，就替换掉了重攻击，
这不是逗吗这？还不如设计个飞镖，直线攻击，起码打得到人啊！
还有，有时候按键无反应，XYAB，移动倒是没问题。（键盘）
--------------------------------------
杂兵方面，我也不知该如何吐槽，
例如像狼一样的那个，我都无语了，
冰冻属性，带跑，少女攻击速度和硬直问题，
导致我根本打不到她，而她却能在移动中攻击到我。
我就不说她们伤害如何了，光打打停停，搞完我都累了，
--------------------------------------
从UI方面讲，比起前面俩个，起码字体看的没那么辛苦了，画面也更清晰了，
唯一的缺点，当然，是我个人觉得的，就是画面太白，对显示器大的家伙简直是折磨，
这四奶碰撞的开头，闪的我眼睛都要瞎了。
--------------------------------------
音乐嘛，我玩游戏一般第一件事就是关音乐，所以呢，我没啥资格评价。
--------------------------------------
说了这么多，我好像都是在喷哪里哪里不好，
好的地方嘛，看其他人写不就好了，
无非都是（哔）子、（哔）子、（哔）子之类的，
光从这点，我也给好评，谢谢。
不过，最后还是想吐槽，为啥换衣服还是不能预览，
太傻了！
--------------------------------------
一个游戏，也不求说什么绝对平衡，
但因为机制和设定，让某些角色从一开始就输了，
外表多漂亮都变得其次，甚至出现让玩家很讨厌，
缺点和优点应该是互存的，而不是只有缺点或优点。
---------------------------------------
等新手柄到了，我再拿前作对比一下

34727207.review:
Who would've thought that a combination of a high quality hack n slash and big breasted anime girls would compliment eachother so much? I certainly didn't and went in skeptical and ended up having quite a bit of fun. While the story is shakey and pretty much 80% sex and boobs and 20% actual plot, if you really just don't care about that, there is fun to be had with this game. Now this is actually one of the best hack n slashes I have played since Devil May Cry when it comes to the fighting mechanics, combos, and the fluid controls. BTW I play with a Steam controller so I have no idea how the game plays out on a keyboard and mouse but with the contoller, I was pulling off hard hitting moves with a breeze. 

The game looks fantastic as well with its colorful enviroments, smooth anime character design, and 60fps capable animations. Speaking of characters, you have 25+ playable characters all with unique fighting styles and weapons. Also you can customize all those characters with many different outfits and accesories that you can unlock by completing the missions. 

So my final thought is this is a solid game with cute anime girls that beat eachother senseless until their clothes are ripped off from their bodies. That's what it's all about and if you are going in wanting exactly that, this game is perfect for you. I rate it 8/10 and would reccomend it to fans of anime/manga and fast pasted fighting games.

34708147.review:
ヴァルキリードライブから逆輸入信心してきました。
シリーズはこれまで未プレイ、知識は瞬間最大風速の同人だけです（それは知識ではない）
以下、レヴュー文中において以下の省略表記を使用する。ヴァルキリードライブ：VD　当作：EV

[h1]ゲームシステムとして[/h1]
VDを先にやったので「速度感」とでも言うべきものの違いを感じますね。
VDの特徴はEVと対比すると以下の通りであり[list]
[*]道中は名無しとの１対多、ボスは名ありとのタイマン（ラストのグンダリを除く）で固定
[*]回避（スマブラで言う緊急回避）があるが防御（同シールド）がない
[/list]
対してEVは[list]
[*]ボスでも１対名あり複数、１対名あり＋名無し、あるいは複数対複数などヴァリエーションがある
[*]防御はあるが回避はなく、状態異常やスタン値、ステージの特徴なども立ち回りとして考慮する必要がある
[/list]
　総じて言うとEVは[b]格ゲー的[/b]ですね。移動が３Dになった代わりに緊急回避がなくなったスマブラっていうか、
全機にアレックスのチョバム（ガンネク仕様）がついたけどステップ回避がなくなった連ジっていうか・・・
（EVを連ジとするとVDはさしずめシールドと変形をなくしてステージ全部を平坦な地上だけにした連ザか？）
立ち回りや忍転身ないし命躯のどちらを選択しどう使うかなども重要そうですね。
VDから来た人間なので「ロックオン対象の能動的選択ができない？」のは少し気になりますが、
システム面の改良前後ってことで。MGS3から来て２でうまいこと相手の前に回り込めない的なアレか。
あとボタン配置が分かりづらいかもですね・・・平時ではKがAでLがBとか。

[h1]キャラゲーとして[/h1]
[strike]ミンゴスはらみーひろりんで実質アイマスやぞ！空見上げ手をつなぐんだよおうあくしろよ[/strike]
キャラ数の多さに伴う声優の豪華さ及び多様なパーソナリティーなどは、私が特記するまでもないのでは？
ボクは王道をゆく・・・忌夢派ですか・・・（抵抗運動）
一人称がボクだし眼鏡だし服装の意匠が軍服っぽくてアリスソフトのバトルノートを想起させるし・・・

[h1]ミリオタ向け要素として[/h1]
[b]ここまで書いてきたこと全部些事。目の前の美少女だのおっぱいなんてどうでもいいんだよ！
枝葉末節を長々と失礼しました、全国に１９４５人はいるであろうケッテンクラート症候群の皆様！
ゲーム開始時の自キャラである両備の使っている小銃が気になりますよね？
あれのモデルはMauser Kar98kでありますねぇ！実質Red Orchestraじゃん！やったぜ戦友！
しかも攻略本かなんかによると、両備の忍転身後の衣装は「黒・白・赤のあの旗」がモチーフとのこと！
ついでに両奈の使う拳銃は「尺取虫」ことP08ですぞ！尊さしかねえぞマイネカメラーデ・・・
みんなーーー！両備か両奈を使えーーーーーーー！（文化祭レース勝利後のりんちゃん並の感想）

　ところで皆さんは両姫のショットガンってなんだと思います？
ボクはウィンチェスターM1887かなーとぼんやり考えてたんすけど、
画像検索した限りでは中折式の上下二連ショットガンっぽく見えるんすよね・・・
[/b]

[h1]総評[/h1]
[strike]ボクは両備がMauser Kar98ｋ使ってるという事実だけで後悔は微塵もないです（半ギレ）[/strike]
このゲームは買うか迷ったら即買った方がいいと思いますよ。熟慮に熟慮を重ねて買うゲームでもないでしょう（問題発言）
買って、遊んで、[strike]銃器鑑定眼か[/strike]オタク的感性か下半身に尋ねてみればいいんです。

You can tell they really made this game with love with all the awesome voice acting, cut scenes/animations, and solid gameplay. Even if you stripped away (pun intended) all the sexy aspects of this game and were left with just the gameplay it would still be enjoyable and challenging, but if you did come for boobs, look no further my friend - Senran Kagura has got your back. "Life is hard, but boobs are soft." #boobsnotblood

The only 'complaint' I would say is the fact that you pretty much need a controller to enjoy this game to its maximum capacity, but that's not really a negative because if you're not utilizing a controller for PC games with controller capabilities then you're doing it wrong. 

Oh and you're about to be introduced to an entire roster of ~30 new potential waifus, it's so hard to just pick one!!! I think I choose Hibari-chan <3 

If you fall in love with this game then don't hesitate to also purchase Shinovi Versus and Bon Apetit! And if you've got a PS4 or 3DS then there's even more titles to enjoy, all worth the full asking price imo. Welcome to the Senran Kagura fam!

34470009.review:
TL;DR: [b]Senran Kagura is a series that is beloved by fans for good reason. The gameplay has always been enjoyable; the story entertaining, and the Waifu meter is off the charts. Estival Versus is no exception.[/b]

Estival Versus is by far the best looking Senran Kagura game to date. The gameplay is very smooth and refined too. As far as the story; it's not the best in the series; but it's by no means bad. There are over 20 of playable characters and several DLC additions The game is focused less around building on the central story of the franchise in this game and more on character progression. I'd reccomend watching the Anime and the OVA to get a sense of the backstory to the game.

If you haven't played a Senran Kagura game before; it's a beat-em up style game with a hearty helping of anime girls. I'd reccomend a controller for any of the games in this series.

Pros:
~ Plenty of 'Plot' with some story on the side
~ Well over 20 Playable characters
~ Gameplay is very well done; very smooth
~ Looks amazing; graphics are top notch
~ Dank 'Uncensor' mods exist for those looking for a bit [i]more[/i] 

Cons:
~ The game doesn't explain the backstory at all; so new players may gonna be confused
~ Story starts off a little slow
~ The plot twist is visable a from space to long time fans; but it is welcome none the less
~ The DLC is pricy; but still worth getting.

Detto questo, passiamo alla recensione vera a propria.

[h1][b][u]Recensione di Senran Kagura Estival Versus : versione breve[/u][/b][/h1]

[h1][b][u]Recensione di Senran Kagura Estival Versus : versione dettagliata[/u][/b][/h1]

La prima cosa in assoluto che si noterà per noi poveri cristi giocanti da PC saranno i comandi. Chi diamine li ha assegnati?! Prima di fare qualsiasi altra cosa, vi consiglio di cambiarli. All'istante. Sono indecenti, e spero che gli sviluppatori in futuro cambino la predisposizione standard tramite una patch. Nel caso non dovessero farlo (probabile), vi ho avvisati.
Tralasciando i comandi standard che sono decisamente da menomati, il gioco è fluido e piacevole. Un action RPG in 3D di tutto rispetto. Azione frenetica, combo, potenziamenti, oggetti, mosse fighe e/o strampalate... Chi più ne ha, più ne metta. Il reparto della giocabilità è ben sviluppato.

La grafica fa (non so se volutamente o no) una netta distinzione tra personaggi ed ambientazioni : i personaggi sono curati nei minimi dettagli e sono molto belli (a mio avviso), mentre le ambientazioni sembrano fuoriuscite direttamente da un videgioco anni '90 od inizi del nuovo millennio. Probabilmente perché le ambientazioni non saranno il punto focale dell'attenzione del giocatore (specialmente del sesso maschile...), quindi diamogliela buona.

La storia.. hmm.. sinceramente non so bene cosa dire. Non so nemmeno se si possa definire "storia". Dal momento che, però, tutto sommato, il gioco è stato creato appositamente per divertire ed essere stupido, penso che la storia importi fino a mezzogiorno. Certo, uno straccio di trama c'è, intendiamoci, ma è qualcosa di vagamente somigliante a Dragonball.
Una cosa che non mi è piaciuta molto del gioco sono i personaggi.. a mio avviso molto stereotipati. Molte tsundere, qualche yandere o schizofrenica, un paio di loli, un paio di kuudere e molte altre "nella norma". E poi mi sbattono in faccia Murasaki. Un personaggio.. abbastanza anormale, nel suo genere. Nerd, solitaria, timida, riservata, odia il sole e la spiaggia... Sembra me.

In definitiva, che dire... Se volete ridere e scatenarvi allo stesso tempo, ve lo consiglio caldamente. Penso riesca molto bene in entrambi gli intenti. Ma, come già detto e ripetuto, [b][u]non prendetelo sul serio[/u][/b].
Per quel che riguarda il prezzo, penso che € 40 sia un po' altino... € 30 sarebbe già un po' più appropriato, € 25 assolutamente perfetto. Se il titolo v'ispira, vi consiglio di comprarlo quando è scontato.

34247184.review:
The words of this series' producer will forever echo in eternity: <Plots> are life, <backstory> is hometown.

It's Senran Kagura.  You know, that series about big balloons.  You might think you know exactly what you're getting into by buying this.  Beneath the fanservice, though, there is actually a game, believe it or not.


[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b]

+ Gameplay is a solid musou/beat-em-up/fighting game hybrid.  Most levels consist of fighting large waves of enemies, followed by a boss fight.  Movelists are simple and easy to memorize, but each character feels distinct, and they have some tricks up their sleeves that the game doesn't explicitly tell you about.  Attacks have weight to them, and you'll need to learn the timings for block/dodge cancelling out of moves to keep afloat on higher difficulties, along with being able to read the opponent’s moves.  (Yomi’s not called Yomi for nothin’.)

+ Lots and lots and [i]lots[/i] of waifus to pick from.  Every character from Shinovi Versus makes a return, along with some new additions, including an ornery old grandmama, and a girl who is the living embodiment of [B]HYPE[/B].

+ Dressing room and diorama modes allow for plenty of [strike]doll dress-up[/strike] character customization and silly shenanigans as you please.

+ Very good port, running at a steady 60 FPS with no issues and supporting most sane and some insane resolutions.  Even a relatively weak computer should be able to handle this game with no issue.

+ Lots of polish put into the game's visuals, especially in the animation department.  The first time you hit that Shinobi Transformation button, you'll see where most of the budget went.  Special moves (called Ninja Arts) and even some basic attacks have their own special camera cutaways to make them that much cooler.  That kind of thing, along with some fun attention to detail (Yumi's iceboarding "sprint”, for instance) really adds to the eye candy.

+ The soundtrack is [b]exceptionally[/b] good, consisting mainly of instrumental J-rock along with some unusual pieces, like Haruka's theme, which is a saucy blend of traditional Spanish and French music, and the themes for the Gessen Academy girls, which are all remixes of classical pieces.  Every character and every stage has its own theme, and most of the Shinobi Transformations are designed so the animation syncs up with the music for that extra [i]oomph[/i].

+ Ninja Arts are no longer extremely overpowered, as most of them have a long startup and can be avoided if you aren’t caught in the middle of something.  Also, Ultimate Ninja Arts are now easier to use, no longer having a requirement of being low on health.

+ Mods exist for those whose perversion quota is still not satisfied, or who find that the girls are too [B]T H I C C[/B] for their tastes.

+ An extra plus for Daidouji, AKA that character who will cause you to think "one of these is not like the others." Another half-plus for Kagura, which would be a full-plus if she was not DLC.


[b][u]Neutral:[/u][/b]

+/- The combat is overall a lot slower and weightier than Shinovi Versus.  Some people might prefer it, while others might find they prefer playing at the hyper-speed of Shinovi Versus.

+/- Japanese-only voiceacting, but it’s high quality, and there’s subtitles for English, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese.

+/- The story is mainly focused on comedy, as opposed to Shinovi Versus, which was mostly serious in tone.  It’s typical self-aware ecchi anime writing, but if that’s your thing, then it’s more than satisfactory.  The more serious elements that do exist in the story are quite dark, and it’s almost upsetting that there isn’t yet a Toukiden-style Senran Kagura game that involves fighting yoma.

+/- Gameplay is repetitive and doesn’t have great variety, but the amount of characters and their various quirks will keep it interesting to the end.

+/- Multiplayer exists, but is not very active.  Recommend getting some friends together if you want some competitive action (assuming you can convince them that this isn’t just Boobs: The Game).


[b][u]Cons:[/u][/b]

- Plays poorly on mouse and keyboard, but that is the status quo for Japanese PC ports right now, especially action games like this one.  Get a controller adapter and you’ll have a much better time.

- Noticeable aliasing, even when downsampling from a higher resolution.  It’s a shame, considering Shinovi Versus is aliasing-free when downsampled.

- Weirdly low resolution on some textures, like the characters’ faces.  It’s minor, but considering how often the camera zooms close to the characters, it’s very noticeable.

- Combat can feel clunky at times, especially with slower characters.  Turn radius is a little too slow, and dodging can be fickle.  Trades can get weird, too, since light attacks have little to no hitstun, but they do have a chance to cause an actual stun state.  Against large groups of enemies (or when fighting multiple bosses), it’s very easy to get stunlocked, which can be frustrating.

- There’s a minor RPG mechanic where characters level up, but this mainly has the effect of locking away moves and making you under/overpowered for the missions.  If a mission seems way too hard, it’s probably because you need to level up the character in use.

- Dammit, Yumi, you are not the main character!


[b]Overall:[/b] Buy it if you like what you see, and/or if you like fun action games that aren’t too stressfully complicated to jump into.  Don’t buy it if boobs and/or anime offend you and murdered your dog.

34235815.review: A step up from its already-good predecessor in literally every way: better singleplayer, better character balance, more distinct character playstyles, better multiplayer (though, not on PC, since it's practically dead (and rife with hackers, apparently)), a neat diorama feature, actually-threatening mob enemies, and a nice parrying mechanic that I'm not even sure was in the previous game; character customization is also much improved, outfits being able to be worn in both pre-transformation and post-transformation in any combination, letting you wear transformation outfits in your normal form and vice versa. The roster only got bigger in this game - no characters removed, only added, which is great. Although the multiplayer is mostly dead, there are organized places to find people to play with, such as Discord servers. The addition of teammates in the singleplayer is warranted by the new fusion aerial rave and aerial rave interception mechanics, making team fights more interesting in multiplayer as well. I'm also glad you no longer have to be at 20% HP to use your Ultimate Secret Ninja Art - you just need the five scrolls. The crossover/guest characters are interesting in that they don't have transformations, and can use Secret Ninja Arts right away, although with the stipulation of not being able to use the full-health restoration tactic.

TL;DR: You know what you are getting into. It's fine as a musou, even with its' noticeable issues.

Pros:
+ Solid Port
+ Pleasant Artstyle (as in the color palette and look of the game you perverts)
+ Plenty of Content for the price
+ Slick Musou Combat
+ Wide Variety of Characters to play as
+ Shorter Missions keep up a tight pace
+ Attempts at drama do work
+ Doesn't take itself too seriously; it knows what it is and embraces it
+ Fans of the series will genuinely love it

Cons:
- DLC is stupid
- Combat is repetitive compared to many other well known beat em ups.
- Leveling system makes weird difficulty spikes, requiring one to grind to get characters up to par 
- Some characters are clearly better than others 
- Going back and forth between the different campaigns feels awkward
- End Game is genuinely unsatisfying

Neutral
_ The objectification will either bring you in or turn you away
_ Multiplayer exists, I guess

온라인 게임만 하다가 스팀 겜 시작한 겜알못 기준.


일단 60시간 플레이하면서 스토리모드, 커스터마이징, 대전 즐길건 다 즐겨봤는데.. 다 해보고 난 느낌은 '게임이 생각보다 엄청 알차다' 네요. 


필살기, 오들 피니시 등 같이 각종 구경거리도 생각보다 정말 많았고, BGM이나 타격감도 굉장히 시원시원하고 신나는 느낌이 들었습니다. 더불어 무쌍류(?)게임의 특징인걸까.. 게임이 질질 끌리는 느낌 없이 스피디하게 시원시원하게 진행되는 느낌이 강했습니다. 


스토리는 확 몰입해 빠져드는 그런 스토리보다는.. 캐릭터성이 부각되고 귀여움이 좀 드러나는데 초점이 맞춰진 것 같습니다. 마음에 드는 캐릭터가 있거나 생긴다면 스토리모드는 가볍게 & 즐겁게 하실 수 있을 것 같습니다.(참고로 이 게임의 스토리를 절반 클리어하면 달성되는도전과제가 있는데.. 구매자의 50%가 달성못하고 사라질 정도입니다. 스토리 진행에 항마력도 조금? 많이? 필요합니다.) 대부분이 그 '부위'를 보고 시작하는 만큼 스토리는 본작에서 아주 중요하지는 않다고 생각되니 패쓰~.  


커스터마이징은 각 부위 선택 및 위치 지정이 가능해서.. 원한다면 진짜 예쁘고 화려하게 혹은 정신나간 외형으로 꾸밀 수 있었습니다. 캐릭터 코디를 좋아하시는 사람이면 커스터마이징도 꽤 재밌게 다가올 것같습니다.


대전은 일단 네트워크 환경이 쾌적했던 것 같습니다. 20판은 한 것 같은데, 순간이동, 끊김 같은 건 한 번도 없었습니다. 단, 문제는 대전 인파가 적다는 정도?.. 그래도 오후, 저녁 시간에 3~5명은 항상 보였습니다. 생각보다 한국인이 많고 새벽시간 대에는 유럽 친구도 만날 수 있었습니다. 대전에서 특히 언급해야할 것은 캐릭터 레벨업과 밸런스 일 것 같은데.. 개인적으로 나쁘지않고 괜찮았(?)던 것 같습니다.


캐릭터 레벨업의 경우, 스토리모드를 전부 끝내도 그다지 많이 오르지 않습니다. 따라서 대전 유저들과는 다르게 캐릭터 능력치 차이(체력, 공격력, 방어력)가 발생할 수 있고, 섬(변신전), 양(변신후), 음(홀라당)의 레벨 능력치 차이도 생기게 됩니다만.. 스토리 모드 중에 '아주 편하게' 레벨업을 할 수 있는 던전이 몇몇개 있었기 때문에 정말 편했었네요. 그 던전이 스토리 모드 끝자락에 나오는 던전이었지만 말입니다.('몇 번을 패배하더라도' 던전)


밸런스는 함부로 말하기 어려운 문제라고 생각하는데.. 확실히 상대하기 까다롭고 난해한 캐릭터는 있었습니다. 의외로 대전에서 심리전적인 요소가 꽤 많았었고, 이를 통한 역공이 가능해서 재밌었습니다. 하지만 캐릭터 기본기에 대한 세세한 설명이 없다보니 쪼끔 불편했었습니다. 대전의 모드 중에는 플레이어가 협동해 디펜스를 하는 모드도 있는데, 단계 클리어에 따라 각 캐릭터의 뱃지 코스튬을 주니 심심하면 해보시길 바랍니다.

여담으로 DLC구성도 이야기 하자면, DLC는 크게 '추가 플레이어블 캐릭터', BGM팩(인게임 교체 가능)', '추가 싱글 게임 모드(특별임무)', '코스튬팩'이 있는데, 글 상단의 6줄 요약을 충족하면 질러도 충분히 마음에 들 것이라고 생각합니다. 우리나라 온라인게임 과금보다는 혜자인 것 같네요.

'그 부위'를 좋아하고 캐릭터 게임, 무쌍류 게임을 좋아하는 신사라면 꽤 재밌게 즐길 수 있을겁니다.

33771263.review:
After playing Shinovi Versus, I was excited to see this finally coming to Steam. Not only is it a sequel to Shinovi Versus, but it greatly improves upon the original game in almost every way. Improved graphics, More characters, more customization, more missions, a more cohesive story, improved characters, updated features, brand new features, and more! As I big fan of Shinovi Versus, Estival Versus does not disappoint at all, and actually blows away many of my expectations. While not perfect, like the original, it greatly improves upon the formula and makes it an even more enjoyable experience.


Pros

-Many characters. Before DLC, there's well over 25+ different characters, and the DLC characters are well worth it, especially Ayame, Naraku, and Kagura. 

-Greatly improved combat. Combat is far less repetitive than in Shinovi Versus, with improved combos and combat flow, "bombshells", stronger character growth, and more. 

-Even better customization. Multiple color options for clothing and accessories, expanded options (such as making accessories form specific), more accessory slots, being able to use both normal outfits and shinobi outfits universally, etc. There is also a diorama feature if you want to take humorous screenshots of characters.

-New visuals and features, such as "creative finishers", more dynamic cutscenes, and better animations overall.

-Larger, more interesting maps. They are much larger, and have more paths available.

-Even more to unlock. Expanded Library offers new visuals, such as the creative finishers and character-specific animations. Shinobi Heart missions return, and there are now additional side missions to complete!

-More missions. 50+ Story missions, and over 120 Shinobi Heart Missions (all of which are available to all characters after completion). There are additional DLC missions as well.


Cons

-While starting fairly weak already in Shinovi Versus, Characters start out even weaker in Estival Versus, and levelling is overall slower (although much more gradual) than before. You can also level mid-mission, and make use of unlocked combos and abilities in the moment, so this is not too bad.

-Bosses are significantly tankier, especially in later missions. This means some missions may drag on.

-Some characters (no spoilers) only have a Shinobi form, meaning they have no access to Yin or Flash, limiting how far you can really level them. This also means they lack the full-heal transforming provides.


Misc

-Similar to Shinovi Versus, it still requires several menus to switch characters for customization.

-Lingerie Lottery is back with more lingerie....but the animation is now slower.

-While there is far more DLC than with Shinovi Versus, none of it is truly necessary. The game is perfectly fine with none, and the only ones I would say are necessary are Character DLC's. Naraku, Kagura, Ayame, Ikki Tosen, and Dead or Alive Ayane.

-Shopkeeper Girl is a (DLC) Playable Character!


Overall, a very strong step-up from Shinovi Versus, fixing many of the flaws and providing much more interesting content that further improves on the formula, and that means more interesting combat and fan service both! While Shinovi Versus is a fantastic introduction to the characters, Estival Versus is definitely the superior version.

9/10

33623739.review:
炎炎夏日，相信小伙伴们已经热得不行了。Steam上能够给你带来清凉感觉的，非《闪乱神乐》系列莫属了。《闪乱神乐》是由Tamsoft 开发，日本厂商Marvelous发布的一款动作类游戏。说起Marvelous，可以说它是做打擦边球游戏的老司机了，有名的作品遍地开花，像什么《魔法老师》啊，《一骑当千》啊，《TO LOVE出包王女》啦，都出自他们之手。而且无一例外都是卖肉作品，在绅士圈里收到不断的好评。《闪乱神乐》系列最先发布在任天堂3DS平台，后来依次在psv、ps4、pc平台发售，本作《闪乱神乐EV》是发布在Steam的第二部正统作品，在延续了上作《闪乱神乐SV》的手感的基础上，优化了游戏操作，当然Steam版也是由PS4版移植过来，相比PSV版有着更强的画质、更贴切的UI，以及流畅的帧数，带给玩家更棒的游戏体验。
[h1]高配的nai子，极致的爆衣[/h1]
相对于光荣脱裤魔的《死或生5》将爆衣和乳摇在PC平台的阉割，《闪乱神乐》系列可谓良心，福利方面一点也没有阉割，还给广大绅士们带来高清化的nai子，制作人高木谦一郎可谓将绅士的兴趣研究到了极致。过场剧情使用动漫式过场，毫不拖沓，流畅至极。人物对话也使用即时演算，不过不足的地方是对话时人物的动作表情还欠些火候。人物建模都非常不错，nai子的多边形算法处理得十分好，更甚者说PS4版就因为胸部的多边形过多导致多人对战时发生掉帧。游戏中几乎每个角色都有两颗如水球一般的胸，连平胸角色两备忍转身后都强行变大，虽然看着很美很惊艳，但是有点缺乏真实感。（在游戏里寻找真实感我真是有病！！）
游戏里角色血量降到一定的量就会爆衣，这是一大亮点，另广大玩家无比兴奋。不过游戏是个擦边球游戏，过分的外露是不允许的，故在全平台上，游戏都会被打上一层圣光来掩盖。
[h1]豪华声优阵容，欲罢不能[/h1]
一款游戏没有好的配音将会使乐趣降低很多，厂商早就意识到了这一点，早早为玩家准备了强大的声优阵容，日笠阳子配的两备好不好？——好！！！喜多村英梨配的焰喜不喜欢？——喜欢！！！茅野爱衣配的咏买不买？——买……就这样，官方拿着华丽的声优表往上堆，砸，玩家也十分接受，各种声线满足了不同的绅士的喜好，没有你怕没有的，只有你想不到的，官方就是这么恐怖的存在。
[h1]无厘头的剧情，搞笑又好玩[/h1]
《闪乱神乐》系列剧情讲的是忍(mo)者(fa)学(shao)派(nv)们之间的斗争。本作的剧情发生在カグラ千年祭上，这是小百合为了打败更强大的妖魔而举办的一场修行，而在千年祭上，过去死去的忍者会复活参加，四个学派在千年祭上比赛，胜者将会踏入下一代神乐的大门。听起来十分庄重，然而游戏本身却很搞笑，比赛也各种无厘头，什么吃胖次比赛（恶）、打屁屁比赛（my god）、摸胸比赛（够了！）……严肃的气氛一挥而去，这不是什么鬼忍者修行，这是绅士们的狂欢吧……
[h1]动作方面还算可以，深度欠缺[/h1]
初见玩家的见解，《闪乱神乐EV》作为一款无双动作游戏打击感还算是可以的，动作方面都很流畅，相比上作，有所改进。游戏招式很华丽，连招都衔接顺滑，最新又加入了爬墙系统，玩法就更多了。游戏拥有26名可操作角色，DLC增加了一些附加角色，各个角色能力和技能各种各样，就算刁钻的玩家，总有一个适合他。角色有忍转身和命驱两种状态，都能加强角色。游戏除了战斗之外还有更衣室，里面就是比较绅士的内容了，玩家可以为喜欢的角色更换衣服，还可以抚摸角色……游戏有货币的概念，不过货币都是用来购买衣服和饰品还有其它音乐之类的。游戏除了可以单机玩耍，还可以网上撕逼，不过联机都是被一些强势角色霸占罢了。
培养方面，角色靠经验来获得升级，但是除了衣着外武器和防御属性都不可自行更换，使得游戏的深度大大降低，初周目过后，估计就没有玩第二遍的欲望了。
[h1]DLC地狱[/h1]
不知道是不是学的光荣脱裤魔的，游戏有大量的DLC衣物，也有几个DLC人物和任务包，林林总总加起来都快400人民币了，游戏才100元，真是靠买衣服圈钱啊，不知道是不是非常核心的玩家才会给掏腰包了呢？
[h1]总结[/h1]
游戏还可以，卖肉和动作都兼顾了，可圈可点。游玩的过程中，请勿忘了补充营养。
优点：
          +无厘头的剧情
          +养眼的妹子
          +豪华的配音阵容
          +爽快的打击体验
          +支援繁体中文

缺点：
          -缺乏深度的游戏系统
          -DLC地狱
购买建议：游戏针对于二刺螈宅这样的特定人群，如果你是这样的人，绝对物超所值。
图文版：[url]http://www.gimmgimm.com/article/info?id=11514[/url]

33613918.review:
Bought this game for the boobs - and the mods to show them boobs. After the initial thrill wore off, the game definitely is still fun and kept playing it all the way through.

Story 7/10: Compared to the more serious tone of SHINOVI VERSUS, the story in this game is a bit more laid back and more fun, though it can get serious when it needs to, so it's all just laughs and a good time.

Gameplay 8/10: While each character is pretty much Mash/Hold Attack + Launcher + Aerial Attacks + Specials; they have their own unique feel to them which gives a health variety. They all have 3 unique specials that also feel different between the shinobis. Most of the missions involve fighting mass waves of enemies then fighting characters 1v1, 1v2, and 1v3. Using their specials against mass waves of enemies just has a statisfying feel. Think of it like Dynasty Warriors.

Sound/Music 8/10: It's all in Japanese with English subs, but even then, it's translated well and the dialogue will definitely have you laughing and but also remind you that there is a serious story overall. The music is catchy, probably what you'd expect from most Anime. Nothing sounds awful or terrible - loved it all. And compared to the first game, it's a big improvement with the music!

Graphics 9/10: While most of the budget probably went to boob physics, the game's overall look is crisp and clean. Going from the previous game to this game, you can see a huge improvement in just about everything: models, textures, animations, camera...it's all been improved in every area and really brings it all together. The best is during combat, that's where all the animations shine the most. But in the story mode, when telling scenes between battles, it looks a bit bland with each character using a few poses that are reused over and over. The weird thing is, they also did this in the previous game, but even that was improved in this game.

Overall 7/10 - It's a pretty average game with an average story and average combat. The biggest selling point is obviously the fan service, but once you get past that, it just shows the game is average. It's shown ALOT of improvement from SHINOVI VERSUS and this series could definitely blossom to become more than just a fan service game, as it is apparently becoming more popular with more spin-offs coming soon.

this is one of the most fun games I have played in a long while.

this game is not for story. if you expect any anime related game with an obvious amount of fanservice to have a good story, you need to stop acting like everything needst to be SUPER SERIOUS DRAMATIC REALISTIC ANUS CLENCHING CLIFFHANGERS and instead laugh along as this game takes you for a fun ride while giving you a 3/4 boner the whole time.
the controls feel very satisfying and each hit on an enemy feels like it has a lot of impact with the heavy hitter characters. the combos look and feel great, and the special moves all have great visuals. 
customization is nearly limitless with the countless options for outfits, hair, accesories, and yes, lingerie. 
Mission and character DLCs are good, but the customization DLCs dont feel up to par with the things that they give, and the game itself already has many options for you to change color and style, so those DLCs are purely if you want more outfits and such.
as far as replayability, the game has multiple difficulties, letter grading after stages, and individual character progression to keep you playing for a long while, and you will find yourself going back to stages quite often if you want to improve your score or level up some more.
as far as the quality of the fanservice, this whole game is like watching a softcore porno where anime girls periodically beat the absolute fuck out of eachother with their clothes being ripped/flying off every so often. the erm... "physics" are a focus and there is even a groping mode in the customization section of the game just in case you feel like you would want that. as for everything from japan featuring multiple anime girls in a group, they pretty much figured out every fetish of the audience and put them into their respected characters. have fun, perverts.

Even if you arent the type for stopping for a 30 min fap break during the game, id highly reccomend it to anyone who wants a good anime beat em up game with great visuals and lots of gameplay.

Do you like Anime? Do you like hack n slashers with combo systems and RPG light elements? If you answered yes to any of those I recommend this game entirely. Look, alot of people claim this is just porn blah blah, but it makes me wonder if said people have even seen porn before? I doubt porn creators would slap their seal on this because it really is far from porn. If you're an SJW that gets triggered by the sexualisation of characters then maybe dont play this, and maybe dont watch Anime either. Or even go outside. Ever.

If you arent though and can tell the difference between porn and a video game, Grab this title as i did for a game with substantial content and half decent combat. It runs at a perfect 60fps at 1080i on my underwhelming gaming laptop so other proper setups will not have an issue. I cannot comment on 4k compatibility as I dont have a monitor that supports said range.

闪乱神乐操作方法（使用主键盘和鼠标）
一、	基本操作
移动 WSAD
视角 TGFH或者直接用鼠标操控
挑衅 方向键↑
强制脱离 方向键↓
弱攻击 I
强攻击 O
跳跃受身 K
冲刺 L
忍转身 Q
防御 R
系统菜单 Tab
当前角色出招表 H
一段忍术 Q+I
二段忍术 Q+O
绝秘传忍 Q+L
飞翔乱舞 击飞敌人(有闪光特效)，立刻按L冲刺，攻击
合体飞翔乱舞 击飞敌人(有闪光特效)，同时按R＋L
命驱 R＋O
飞檐走壁 按下K跳跃途中按下L
蹬壁奇袭 飞檐走壁过程中进行攻击
二、	手柄与键盘对照
X=I
Y=O
B=L
A=K
start=tab
LB=Q
RB=R
三、	更衣室操作
1)	非预览界面
鼠标左键是确定，鼠标右键是取消
可使用WASD和TGFH对人物进行调整
2)	预览界面
按I可进入预览界面
触摸之手 同时按住X和B
左手 WASD＋X
右手 TGFH＋B
退出预览 L
3)	爆衣
鼠标左键不停的在上衣处滑动，就会出现连击数。
100连击开始爆衣，800连击完全爆衣。
4)	接吻
鼠标（左键轻触摸，右键用力摸）或者用左右手点击胸部。
右上角的心满之后，直接用鼠标右键，左手或右手点击人物的手。
这时人物会伸出双手，鼠标左键点击人物的左手或右手进入接吻画面。
按WASD，调整嘴唇位置，当嘴唇的位置和人物的嘴对上时，按鼠标左键接吻

33359313.review:
I have fun playing this game.  It is in no way worth the price tag.

It's a fun little brawler with some fun characters, mired in sloppy design choices.  Pointless barriers constantly get in your way even though you can and must walk right around them.  You're constantly in a situation of not being able to just walk down an open street, but instead having to scour the perimeter for the one rooftop the devs decided you could leap over to access the other side of the street.  

The AI just outright does not appear to have pathing at all; AI opponents attempt to move in a straight line toward wherever the player is, and jump if they encounter obstacles.  This means they constantly get  hung up on the aforementioned pointless barriers.  How do you make a game with so many obstacles and not give the AI any kind of pathing ability? It's pathetic.

The single player mode is one of those ones that force you to play a little bit of every character, which means you will constantly find yourself playing characters you don't like or who have aggravating playstyles.  The online multiplayer is not very active, so you won't get a lot of play out of it unless you have a friend to play with.

It's fun, but it's not worth the full price.  And frankly, it is insultingly sloppy in its design.

Graphics: 10/10 - If you like anime, you will love this.
Music: 9/10 - Gets a bit repetitive but it's hype if you like cheery and eerie anime tunes.
Controls: 10/10 - Easy to learn, hard to master. Some of the characters take actual skill to use.
Content: 10/10 - Pure hack and slash with some ecchi involved. 

Things to do: 
PVE - Beat down on npcs with a wide roster of completely unique combat concepts.
PVP - Doable but not a real fighting game. It can be fun.
Dressup - You unlock a ton of clothes as you go along and customise the characters. 
DLC absolutely worth getting too.

I adore this game for its allure, simplicity and replayability.

33239090.review:
Не играл в предыдущие Кагуры и впечатление может быть поэтому более ярким, но жаждал поиграть сразу именно в Estival Versus еще в 2015, с бабушкой Саюри, хотя с тайтлом знаком с 2013 по не особо удачному аниме. ПеКа боярину на консоль тратится негоже, и мечта должна была остаться мечтой, пока в 2016 не выпустили Shinobi Versus, что стало колокольчиком к появлению этой игры.

Что ожидал:
- Много симпатичных аниме-девочек
- Много симпатичных аниме-девочек с несколько гипертрофированными формами
- Зрелищные комбо удары по 1000 хитов, которые посылают в воздух куски каменных плит заодно с противниками
- Рванную одежду и много панцу!

Получил ли требуемое? Всего вышеперечисленного оказалось с лихвой и боярен остался доволен настолько, что за дня 4 наиграл 40 часов, прошел сюжетку, а остановиться сил в себе до сих пор не находит.

Что удержало:
- Неожиданный замечательный юмор, который не ограничивается лишь тематикой нижнего белья (а тот, который его касается, того стоит)
- Несмотря на обилие персонажей и их очевидные прототипы-шаблоны на первых взгляд, каждый из них имеет какую-то уникальную отличительную черту. Не поворачивается язык назвать ни одну из девочек "картонной", несмотря на творящийся сюрреализм и сценарный бред. А их, напомню, 30.
- Таки реиграбельность. Поначалу любым персонажем банально не пройдешь миссии на высокий ранг, т.к. обязательно нужно пройти определенную прокачку, чтобы он (точнее, она), наконец, смог связывать комбо или хотя бы расширил их.
- Довольно простой, конкретный геймплей. Есть арена, ее нужно зачистить. Никаких сложностей, все предельно просто и ясно. Вся игра проходит лишь в "одной плоскости", но потому, что она одна единственная, эта плоскость доведена до совершенства.
- Большое количество приличных на вид CG. Музыкальное сопровождение же, видимо, заимствованно и с предыдущих частей.

А теперь, то, что было неожиданным. Тут есть мягкий спойлер, который может завысить ожидания, все-таки, игра преимущественно о сиськах и большего от нее не ждать не стоит, однако:
- [spoiler] Под конец вместо фансервисного отдыха на пляже получил довольно синтоисткую историю о смерти. О том, что хочешь сказать дорогому человеку, которого уже нет в живых, но такая возможность внезапно предоставляется. Показан конфликт поколений. А еще к этому и притча о том, что важнее: следование цели или ходьба на поводу чувств. [/spoiler]
[spoiler] Это как-то совсем не то. Я собирался одной рукой держать геймпад, а другой тянутся к ширинке, а вышло так, что одна рука на геймпаде, а другая на титрах тянется к носовому платку. [/spoiler]

В общем, обожаю я такие игры и японщину. В определенной нише это "золото", и она наверняка займет место в "золотом фонде охотников за панцу".
В разы превзошедшие ожидания 10/10. Несмотря на жадность, рано или поздно куплю все DLC все подаренные эмоции и чувства.

33128197.review:
게임패드만 있다면 B급을 가장한 A급 게임

장점
1. 캐릭터가 이쁩니다. (가면벗은 무라쿠모 최고)
2. 가슴
3. 수준 높은 액션성
4. 훌륭한 수준의 한글화
5. 성우들의 풀 보이스
6. 상당한 수준의 커스터마이즈
7. 약빨은 듯한 백화요란기와 적절히 진지한 메인 스토리의 조화
8. 이로 인한 상당한 볼륨

단점
1. 심각한 캐릭터 밸런싱 : 공속 느린 캐릭터, 사거리가 짧은 캐릭터 등 등 캐릭터마다 성능차가 심각합니다. 멀티만이 아닌 솔로플레이에도 지장이 갈 수준
2. 최악의 키보드 지원 : 게임 패드가 없으면 답이 안 나옵니다.
3. 애매한 최적화 : 너무 구린건 아닌데 그렇게 좋은 것도 아닌 최적화, 프레임이 좋았다가 나빴다가 왔다갔다 합니다
4. 카메라 시점이동 : 게임 패드를 써도, 적응해도 불편한 건 사실인 시점 이동


이 세상에 완벽한 게임은 없다지만 생각보다 심각한 단점은 별로 없고 즐겁게 즐기기 충분한 게임이라고 생각합니다.
게임 스타일이 막 벗기는 그런 B급 에로게임 느낌이 물씬 나지만 요목조목 따저보면 무쌍류 액션 게임으로는 충분한 수작이라고 생각합니다.
오히려 B급 느낌나는 그런 벗기고 가슴이 흔들리는 그런 느낌이 컬트적인 인기를 모아서 더욱 재밌는 게임을 만든 것 같네요
오덕 요소에 저항감만 없으시고, 게임패드만 있으시다면 돈 값 충분히 하는 좋은 게임이라 생각됩니다.
가슴을 좋아하시면 더 없는 완벽한 게임이고요

33121115.review:
I bought this game as a joke but I was also slightly intrigued by the OVERWHELMINGLY POSITIVE reviews. Most of them memes but the most helpful ones are like "YO THIS GAME IS TIGHT AS FUCK."

yeah they're not kidding, beyond all the tiddies and anime nonsense, this game is actually a lot of fun. 

I personally like beat 'em up type games if yknow what im sayin ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) and that's pretty much what this game turned out to be.

plus, if you can't tolerate all the anime noises and whatever you can just skip it all and get to the game. you can very easily just play the game and completely ignore the story.

though the game's not perfect. maybe it's just me, but there are a few characters who seem a little underwhelming, and others who seem wipe the floor with enemies. i got a 1.9k combo one off of like the weak generic enemies. i don't think that was supposed to happen, but it felt pretty good.

The opening missions are a little gimmicky with clunky tutorial stuff, but once you get a handle on the controls and play around with more characters the game is a blast. though i think im playing on easy mode. time 2 git gud.

The stereotypical anime stuff is a bit much, but i think that's just because the devs are aware that the character design is bassed off of the well rounded CHARACTER ARCS and THICCCC PLOTS, so it's pretty easy to laugh at the story's absurdity.

other than that, it's a very solid game. 

if you can't stand anime, and beat 'em up games aren't your thing, then i wouldn't buy it if i were you. to me though it's been worth a buy and i can see myself putting real time into this game.

You can really sort of just pick it up, turn off your brain, and start beating the utter shit out of everything.

- 平衡性好多了，不会出现“见到boss就丢2个大招然后结束战斗”的情况了。
- 技能、等级成长变慢了很多，耐玩了不少
- 战斗改了很多：超长的技能后摇、平地闪、技能改动等等
- 更衣系统变了！命驱、影转身和日常完全独立！！万岁~
- 画面好了不少，小兵也会爆衣了。。。但是小兵的爆衣貌似关不掉，其他的可以
- 原生支持中文，不过是繁体
- 活动室没了，感觉菜单逻辑有问题，用的很不爽

优惠信息：2017年夏日特惠25%off。17年的游戏估计差不多就这折扣了，直接买也不算亏。

建议入手，比前作耐玩的多。

再多说个手柄的技巧：
将B改成RT，防御改成LT。理由是快跑时由于不用按住B可以用右摇杆转视角。防御完全貌似2作按键的不一样，直接都是LT了，而且可以避免冲突（为什么会避免我忘了）。
这样一改，命驱则是LT+Y，合体/打断乱舞则是LT+RT

最后，如果觉得有帮助可以点个赞~~

32848938.review:
这款游戏详细的评测在这里：http://pc.tgbus.com/pingce_30/89649/
评测已经全部重写，附带动图，看福利（摇啊摇）或者实际游戏效果的玩家可以考虑去看看。我只是一个热心的玩家，无偿推荐而已。

夏季大促入的，打折力度一般，DLC较多，原本只打算买前作，送了优惠券顺便买了女武神，索性就全入了=_=，发行商跟G胖狼狈为奸，还我血汗钱……
    作为这个系列的新手，也不敢写什么评测，就写点个人意见，作为想买的同样的新人的参考吧。老手应该毫不犹豫直接就买买买了吧。

    还是那句话，如果你是萌豚，那么下面什么的都不用看了，买吧。这款游戏十分良心，你想要的基本都有。各种属性活蹦乱跳的妹子，庞大的收集要素（光抽奖抽内衣本作就有120套，WTMCB），声优十分给力，全程对话配音，菜单也可以选喜欢的角色语音，没有男主角（应该），剧情轻松，强大的换装系统，自定义更衣室，战斗系统附带爆衣、变身、*摇*摇……无论“你想把它当做什么类型游戏来玩”，都是可以的（会心一笑，我是正经人）。

  [h1]  1.画面：[/h1]
比PC前作闪乱进步了不止一个档次，尤其是光照和抗锯齿，画面比女武神在人物渲染上稍微差了一点，但奈何本作人物众多呢。喜欢画面可以考虑女武神驱动（女武神加上DLC十个人左右，本作5大阵营三十多人，部分DLC解锁）。场景基本进化到可以看了。日厂游戏平均水品（笑），跟欧美大厂没法比。但毕竟卡通风格，还算可以。另外说说UI，有人觉得UI太繁琐，我倒是觉得蛮好看的，就是退游戏不太方便（滑稽），你可以ALT + F4或者 ALT + TAB嘛。本作剧情对话使用了3D人物模型。剧情解锁福利社可以买CG之类的，保持一向高水准。

   [h1] 2.音乐：[/h1]
我很喜欢前作BGM，本作好像可以买DLC换成前作的，壕友们可以试试。音乐风格还是那种带点和风的感觉，不过本作似乎风格更轻松一点。声优依然敬业。主线任务全程语音。支线没做过。此外打击音效也很不错，不同角色使用不同武器音效都不同。其他暂时不知道写什么。

    [h1]3.游戏性：[/h1]
除了上面提到的萌豚们喜欢的各种方面，再提提本作的战斗系统。本作战斗系统有人觉得不好，主要是没办法像以前那样一套连死电脑，取消了以前很多连招。我觉得其实这个仁者见仁。本作额外加入了许多动作模组，现在主要有：近距离攻击，远距离攻击（两种攻击配合连招，倒地攻击配合时机可反击），跳跃（有二段跳，倒地可取消硬直），冲刺闪避（长按可以奔跑，奔跑可以爬墙，爬墙可以攻击；站立可追击空中敌人），防御（有防反），变身（回血换装和脱衣服加攻击），变身后有三种必杀（消耗能量），比上作丰富了不少。小怪AI加强，种类增加，会成群结队上了，而且靠近角色意识增强，再也不用打到残局到处清剩下的零星小怪了。至于一对一格斗，本作一样有联机，没试过（这游戏有竞技性么……这个还是让大佬解答吧，我就不乱说了）。

    [h1]4.剧情（微剧透）：[/h1]
主要就是讲前神乐搞了个仪式，在一座岛上复活了死人，让她们开开心心过8天然后快快乐乐去西天，总结就是超度……如何开心呢？就是把几个学员的人都传送过来，大家一起打架，顺便选出新神乐……剧情很轻松（暂时没玩到后面，感觉离别时分要么煽情难过要么无厘头反转……），本作多了3个巫女，个人很喜欢。支线任务自由度很高，DLC还可以买额外任务包，主要是看角色日常，各个角色耍宝卖萌……（这游戏妹子没几个普通角色，不是贬义，意思就是个性特别鲜明，辨识度极高……）

    [h1]5.操作、优化、bug等：[/h1]
暂时没遇到，有人反映键盘操作不好，我是XBOX ONE手柄玩的，没感觉出来……有问题的人可以反映一下，给其他人作参考（看一眼始终未能解决卡顿问题的生化奇兵，伊丽莎白无缘啊……）

    [h1]总结：[/h1]
[b]萌豚必买。喜欢换装收集的极度推荐，喜欢无双系列的推荐（爽快度没法比，但其他无双能爆衣么？其他无双有变身么？其他无双能高度自定义换装么？）。喜欢格斗游戏的可以考虑。[/b]

    PS：买了这作，大概你也就离萌豚不远了（默默看着库里的女武神、先锋公主、海王星123Uvs、骷髅女孩儿、Shantae、momodora、DOA……）贝姐也救不了我了……

32818203.review:
わざわざこのゲームのレビューを読もうという諸君らのことだ。 
[b]「ゲーム部分が面白いとかつまらないとかはどうでもいい」[/b]と思っているだろう。 
購入した私もそう思っている。 
知りたいのはエロ部分をどれだけ堪能できるか。この一点だろう。 
なので[b]エロ関係についてのみ述べよう[/b]と思う。 

[h1]■更衣室[/h1] 
・着替える 
好きなキャラクターを好きな衣装に着せ替えできるモード。 
着衣・下着や髪形等をいろんなものに変えることができる。 
おっぱいのサイズは変えられない。残念。 
だが、[b]『おさわりハンド』[/b]なるド直球ネーミングの手でおっぱいを揉んだり捏ねたりできるぞ。 
さらにおっぱいを揉みまくると[b]好感度があがって[/b]キスすることができる。意味が分からん。 
とてもじゃないがやってるところを他人に見られたくない。配信機能は切っておくこと。私はフレンドに見られた。 

・ジオラマ 
こちらは好き勝手着替えさせたキャラクターを5人まで好きなように配置できるモード。 
「着替える」ではポーズはとってくれないが、こちらで[b]好きなポーズをとらせることができる[/b]。 
谷間強調・尻強調・女豹のポーズ・M字開脚・仰向けで開脚している[b]おねだり[/b](何をおねだりしているかは諸兄の妄想による)ポーズ等が君を待っている。 
めくるめく百合の園の再現だって可能……かも？ 

[h1]■資料室[/h1] 
水着を着たキャラクター勢ぞろいで謎の踊りを踊るOPやゲーム中のムービー、衣装破れモーション等を再生できる。 
ついでにゲーム中の音楽や画像も見れる。 
ゲーム中に[b]特定条件を満たさねば見れないモーションをなんどでも再生できる[/b]のは利点。 
特に全裸(不思議な光で一部見えない)やられやぷるぷるフィニッシュ(ステージギミックで体を隠す全裸やられ)を繰り返し見れてほんまマーベラスさんありがとうやで。 
このおかげでゲーム部分をやってまで脱がす必要がほとんどなくなる。 

[h1]■MOD [/h1]
全裸時の不思議な光を消すMODはちょっと検索すればすぐ見つかるぞ！ 
残念ながら[b]乳首はない！[/b]ツルッツルの球体おっぱいだが光が邪魔するよりはマシだろう！なお股もトゥルットゥル 
また、「ゲームすすめるのだりい」って君！セーブデータもちょっと検索すればすぐ見つかるぞ！ 
私は購入後ノータイムでMODとセーブを入れて更衣室と資料室だけ遊(?)んでるぞ！ 


[h1]■不満点 [/h1]
ハンズフリーモードがない点。 
自動でキャラクターが動いてぷるんぷるんするモードがないため、股間のレバーを握るタイミングが難しい。 
それにここまでするならいっそのことR18にしてくれと思わなくもない。 
正直こんな恥も外聞もないゲームを看板にしているのだからマーベラスは今更メンツとか気にしなくてもいいだろ。[b]R18版はよ[/b]。

32420555.review:
无奈这是写的第二次了（第一次系统故障不见了QAQ）PS：本人大部分时间离线游戏所以游戏时长偏短，敬请原谅。
闪乱神乐的名气相信不需要太多宣传，这是本系列在steam上的第二部，第一部售价88软妹币

相比前面几作，此作在剧情上相对来说比较外传，如果想入坑推荐从这部开始。
当然，作为无双类游戏总不由得要和无双老大--三国无双进行比较，本人认为，这款游戏在休闲娱乐度方面是要远胜于三国无双的。第一，剧情上的无厘头+懒散愉快的主线调使得游戏玩下来很顺畅欢快，第二，游戏的色彩方面（白天场景）以及萌系建模突出这个欢快的主题，第三，此游戏还有着南国沙滩以及秀色可餐的妹子来当作卖点（然而真正玩进去绝对不是差评说的除了奶子也要记住人有脑子的此类论调）

那么说说游戏的特点。游戏全程轻松愉快，打击感在无双游戏里算的上极佳（但是和选择人物有关，放在后面说）游戏小兵强度远高于其他无双，甚至一些时候比boss强，但这样多了很多新玩法，而不是一味走割草斩boss的无双套路，（虽然可惜没有计策加成）....此外游戏有着组合技，二段悬空跳，爬墙，飞檐走壁等很酷炫的亮点，配合上游戏本身很强的小兵，便很容易上演追逐战（可能能成为新的无双类型？），对于个人来说追逐战的出现大大加强了这个游戏的可玩性。

游戏打击感或许是最受争议的，因为这代增强了所有人的硬直时间。让“怎么打一套就跑”变成了最需要思考的事情，当然游戏并没有为了难而难，每类角色都可以用几种不同的方式来移除硬直，对本人来说，这算得上一次创新。 当然，打击感也有不尽人意的地方，那就是部分角色的打击感直逼泡菜网游，不断让玩家提“我打到谁了吗”“这个技能其实是用来敲地板的吗“这些哲学问题。当然只是部分角色，可能会说不用那些角色不就好了，但是这游戏一周目为了防止冷板凳，是让玩家必须选择固定角色的，有时候玩到那种类型的角色的确心累。况且我觉得.....我买了整个游戏，也应该享受整个游戏的角色吧？（其实只是一两个打击感不是很好的小姐姐太好看想玩啊！）除了那部分角色外，80%以上的角色打击感还是十分完美的，甚至要好于三国无双。互相连击的乐趣也要略高于三国无双。

游戏本身其实也有几个蛮糟心的缺点的，而且缺点略致命（都是些人性化设计问题），第一个就是这个游戏PC版也十分依赖手柄，没有手柄的玩家千万不要购买（包括游戏内提示都是显示手柄键位。）第二就是复杂的UI，每次退出游戏我大概要看到2-3个不同的主菜单（里面东西一模一样）虽然是可以看到更多南国风光啦....不过要退出的时候有点过于复杂了吧（要女朋友突然开门要立刻从换装室退出怎么办啊）第三就是游戏本身新手教程太过于迷了...不会说在新手教程过程中退坑过一次，然而后面又陷进去了....新手教程应该简单点，重要点。第四其实是个现阶段的问题，游戏里线形大招判定有点太依赖角度，不过听说主机端已经修复了这个问题了

这款游戏也自带繁中，听说声优也很大牌（只是听说...不是很了解）110软妹币订价只能说算刚刚好，不能说业界良心，当然也不坑钱，总体来说对中国玩家也算友善啦！

游戏本身亮点很多，推荐给正在玩3A啊这种抑郁剧情游戏，需要一个“开心果”一个轻松的游戏放松一下的玩家们，这是一款给略核心ARPG，ACT玩家的休闲游戏。但是如果不对割草无双感兴趣，恐女症，不喜欢略难的ACT的话，这款游戏还是不适合您的。
PS，没有手柄的玩家游戏价格可能要+300....因为您要准备一个手柄啊....

32406944.review:
我是玩了破解版后回来买正版的，大家别喷，我知道盗正版之间矛盾很复杂，这里我不说矛盾性，我只想说说玩完这游戏的一点感受。

我是第一次接触闪乱神乐系列作品，所以对这游戏我是很好奇的第一眼上去，哇，好多妹纸和奶子....是个男的估计都会这么想。

然后开始，剧情前面是轻快的，甚至是有点搞笑的，操作也很简单，唯一注意的也许就是收招硬直。但是随着剧情推进，我视线从这些妹纸身上转移到了剧情上，看似欢快的背后，隐藏着悲伤。

真的，不管你们准备怎么说我，说我矫情也好，说我装也好，但是我是真的把剧情看进去了。



假如你碰到了你已经逝去的最尊敬最爱的人，你是什么反应？
欣喜，难过，甚至不想再分开？我想兼而有之。讲道理，我不认为我是一个感情很细腻的人，我祖父去世的时候我眼泪都没流几滴，纵使祖父是我家庭变故后最爱我的人其中之一。
现在我19岁，随着一路成长，我总是时不时能想起祖父，想起他不顾老远送我去上学的骑的那辆老旧的自行车，想起那时候生活艰难时每天依然少不了的我最爱吃的炒猪肝...然后，默默地哭一场。说真的，人终归只有长大后，才能意识到失去的东西对于自己的重要性。
言归正传，这游戏里我也找到了对待逝去之人的方式，很简单，也很温馨少女们从不愿离去到欣然接受，虽然剧情只短短叙述了几句，但是我认为这里面的心理活动肯定不止这一些，我很欣慰，也很高兴的看到了蜕变，也感受到了我自己的生活方式。我很感谢这个游戏，所以当我玩通破解后，毫不犹豫的来买正版了，算是对一款好游戏的感动与支持。

结尾再说一次，这是我第一次接触神乐系列我不知道前作的剧情，这些只是我对于这款少女的选择的个人意见，不喜勿喷，谢谢。

32367827.review:
WARNING: This game is surprisingly fun, play at your own risk.

Senran Kagura Estival Versus (EV) follows in the footsteps of its predecessor Shinovi Versus (SV) in subverting the anime tiddy game trope. Exactly like SV, EV looks like a shallow fanservice game at first glance but if you manage to look past the surface of EV, the game is so much more than that.

EV is a sort of a weird amalgamation of gameplay, blending elements of fighting games together with elements of musou games to create its own unique style. On top of that it is a much more extensive game compared to SV and in general succeeds in providing everything a good sequel should. It looks better, it plays better, it has a bigger story, a bigger character roster, more enemy variety and even more extensive customization options.

Yes, you can play waifu dress-up with even more meticulous detail this time around!

Overall, Estival Versus is a shining example of how to get a sequel right. While SV can be finished in a day or two of dedicated play, expect to put much more time into EV. I'm sitting at a 100 hours and I've only just beat the main story and the Shinobi Girl's Heart stories. I have yet to max level all my favourite characters or A-rank most missions on the hard difficulty... Though admittedly, a fair few of these 100 hours have been spent in the dressing room posing characters for dioramas. (It's an addiction, please send help).
